entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming southeast 30 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Light snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
